author: ezbanshee

review: I'm not here to write a book. It's freak'n AMAZING! I have an Apple TV, Roku, Chrome, Sony Blu-ray with apps and Samsung Smart TV. This thing blows them all out of the water, especially for the price.It's FAST and the picture is not a little, a LOT better then all the others. It isn't even close.There are little issues here and there, but Fire TV software seems to be evolving and improving, so I don't see any reason why I'd worry that they won't be eventually addressed. Mature Netflix has a better browsing/favoriting system, Apple TV has a more intuitive, easier interface. Roku is no longer a contender, Chrome just blows.  So, let's give Amazon Fire TV some time to catch up and hope they concentrate on the right things, my guess is they will.Setup was so easy I don't even remember it. Voice control has worked perfectly for me every time. Love that the remote is not infrared (no more pointing!), now I wish all my remotes were the same way.I was disappointed it wasn't set up for AirPlay, but after some searching I found the app "AirPlay/DLNA Receiver PRO" on Amazon's app store and it seems to work perfectly, so job-done. I've enjoyed all the apps I've downloaded so far.I've pre-ordered the Fire TV Stick and until something leap-frogs them, I'm sticking with Fire TV.
